CutSceneText.Text: An Artifact is a mysterious relic from the Tower of Eternity.
No two are alike, but they're all immensely powerful.
We don't understand the full extent of what an Artifact does,
but we can tap a fraction of its power
if we have the proper Activation Stone.
Each Artifact is a devastating weapon in the right hands:
Some can slaughter every enemy within sight,
and others can bring troops back from the brink of death.
Artifacts can turn defeat to victory--or vice versa--
A powerful Protector stands watch over every Artifact;
subdue the Protector, and the Artifact is yours.
